item.description:
Cape Ann Photography Excursion Group January Meetup


Cape Ann Quarries: Part One

Cape Ann Historical Museum
27 Pleasant Street
Gloucester, MA 01930

Meet Time: 1:15PM

Place: On Pleasant Street in front of the Museum.

Admission: Cape Ann residents are free during January.
Members of the museum are free, and may bring a guest for free.
$6.50 for non-residents / non-members.

Parking: There is metered street parking available through downtown Gloucester, a few spots on Pleasant Street, and in a metered lot across from the museum. I can't remember if Gloucester requires meters be fed on Sundays, I'll check into this, but bring change for parking just in case.


Special Exhibit:
"Chapters on a Quarry Wall: The Natural Stone Photography"
Leslie D. Bartlett, Photographer

CAH Museum presents an exhibition of photography by Leslie D. Bartlett, "Chapters on a Quarry Wall: The Natural Stone Photography". It is the culmination of eight years of climbing around quarry ledges to capture the unique light and beauty of the area's granite quarries.


After our visit to CAH Museum we'll walk to the nearby Pleasant Street Tea Company to discuss the exhibit over tea/coffee/snacks. Additionally we'll talk, and share as a group, how lighting, angle, camera/lens, and post-processing techniques, can help bring a very different look to our own photography.

Feel free to bring some of your own work to share. Whether a successful photo that utilized lighting/angle/post-processing to the max, or one that had potential, but didn't quite live up to expectations. Members of the group can offer helpful suggestions and experiences. Please note--If the photos you wish to share haven't been printed, but are available online, e-mail me a link to the photos and I'll setup a way to share them at the meeting.

One final note... consider bringing your camera even though this event is a little different than others we've held, there are many photogenic buildings near the CAH Museum, and weather cooperating it could be a beautiful sunset!

This event is part one, of two, for Cape Ann quarries. Please see February for information on part two!

Links related to this event that maybe interesting or beneficial:

Natural Stone Photography
Follow the Gleam
item.name: Cape Ann Photography Excursion (CAPE) Group January Meetup
